translation.de: -Wenn du ein KitKat für mich hast. -Nun, ich habe ein paar.

translation.en: ♪ Dancing with the Devil ♪
-Excuse me. Smokers for chokers. -[glass shatters]
-What's your problem? -I got a problem? I think you got the problem.
translation.de: -Was ist dein Problem? -Du hast das Problem.

translation.en: How we doing, guys?
-[man 1] What's up, old man? -Got some ID for that drink?
-What? -Yeah, not on my watch.
-What the hell? -It's for the best.
And I think we are gonna dehydrate. Let's break that up.
translation.de: Ich glaube, wir dehydrieren gleich. Schluss damit.

translation.en: -Watch it, GI Jackass. -[man 2] You wanna die?
Not yet.
Uh, excuse me, Grandpa Thermos, you need to leave the party right now.
translation.de: Verzeihung, Opa Thermoskanne, du musst die Party verlassen.

translation.en: Leave public property? I don't see that happening.
Leave. Or I'll beat you with a tire iron.
translation.de: Oder ich verprügel dich mit einer Stange.

translation.en: You and whose army?
Just me.
-And me. -And me.
-And me. -And definitely me.
-Let's kill him! -[all clamoring] Yeah! Yeah!
Hang on! All right.
I realize I might have gone too far for your teenage mental capacities
translation.de: Vielleicht bin ich zu weit gegangen für euren Teenie-Verstand.

translation.en: and that is a boner on my part.
-I don't think he knows what boner means. -No, definitely not.
When I was your age, I made some huge boners.
translation.de: In eurem Alter passierten mir viele Ständer.

translation.en: Boners that I wish I could get back now.
Listen, give me a minute head start, then tell him there's a kid stuck in the corn maze.
translation.de: Warte kurz ab und sag ihm, ein Kind steckt im Mais-Labyrinth fest.

translation.en: And why am I doing that?
'Cause I am going to scare the living crap out of him.
translation.de: Dann werde ich ihm eine Scheißangst einjagen.

translation.en: Really? Does he scare easy?
Yes.
Yes, he does.
[Hubie] Actually, I had a good time with you guys after all.
translation.de: Eigentlich war es nett mit euch.

translation.en: It was fun. Hope we do it again next year. Give a hoot, don't pollute.
translation.de: Hoffentlich bis zum nächsten Jahr. Ruft mich an.

translation.en: -[coughs] Isn't that Woodsy the Owl? -No, he was Tootsie Pops.
Hey, Mr. Pubois.
I think I saw a little kid get lost in the Corn Maze. In the what?
I heard him scream, "Help!" Then he started crying.
My God, it's just-- it's just a little kid!
Okay. Handle your high.
I am a member of the AUU. This is what I was trained to do.
translation.de: Ich bin bei der AUE. Dafür wurde ich ausgebildet.

translation.en: I think we're good!
Messing with Shoobie Dubois. A Salem tradition.
translation.de: Shoobie Dubois ärgern hat in Salem Tradition.

translation.en: My grandma gave him his first titty-twister.
translation.de: Meine Oma kniff ihm in die Brustwarzen.

translation.en: -What a bunch of jerks. -Should we go tell him it's a prank?
translation.de: -Was für Ärsche. -Sollen wir es ihm sagen?

translation.en: I knew I liked you, freshman. Come on.
translation.de: Ich wusste, ich mag dich. Komm.

translation.en: Excuse me, excuse me, Bride of Skankenstein. Yeah, thank you.
If you can hear me, please call out so I can determine your whereabouts!
translation.de: Wenn du mich hörst, rufe etwas, damit ich deinen Standort bestimmen kann.

translation.en: Do not be fearful, little one!
Announce yourself!
[girl] Hubie!
[Tommy] Mr. Dubois!
[girl] Hubie!
[Tommy] Hello!
-Where are you? -Should we split up?
I don't know. That sounds like a big boner.
-What? -I'm just kidding.
[Hubie] Is anyone out there? Sound off!
translation.de: Ist da draußen jemand? Gib Laut!

translation.en: Tonight's temperatures will dip below 28 degrees!
translation.de: Heute Nacht werden wir Minusgrade haben.

translation.en: Your nervous system cannot handle that!
translation.de: Das ist zu viel für dein Nervensystem.

translation.en: Sasquatch could not handle that!
translation.de: Das war sogar für Bigfoot zu viel.

translation.en: [girl] Mr. Dubois? Hello!
-Mr. Dubois! [screams] -[laughs]
What the hell, Mike? Why would you do that?
translation.de: Verdammt, Mike! Warum hast du das getan?

translation.en: Hey, whoa! I'm sorry. Come on, I couldn't resist.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich konnte nicht widerstehen.

translation.en: [Tommy] That wasn't cool, man.
Hey, coffee boy. You're that freshman, right?
translation.de: Hey, Kaffee-Junge. Du bist dieser Freshman, oder?

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
Yeah, well, welcome to your first high school fight.
translation.de: Dann ist das dein erster Highschool-Kampf.

translation.en: [girl] Tommy!
Megan McNally, you like underclassmen?
translation.de: Megan McNally, du stehst auf die Unterschicht?

translation.en: Oh, that's adorable.
[Hubie] Hello!
Is the fight over? Did I win?
Yeah, yeah. Yeah, you kicked his ass. Come on.
translation.de: Ja, du hast ihn vermöbelt. Komm.

translation.en: [Hubie] Is anyone out there? Sound off!
translation.de: Ist da draußen jemand? Gib Laut!

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] Help!
Remain in place! I will find you!
translation.de: Bleib, wo du bist! Ich werde dich finden!

translation.en: Not if I find you first! [snickers]
translation.de: Nicht, wenn ich dich zuerst finde!

translation.en: Take me, evil one! Just do not harm the child!
translation.de: Nimm mich, Bösewicht! Aber lass ja das Kind in Ruhe!

translation.en: [high-pitched voice] Help, Hubie!
No!
Dad? Is that you?
Does Mom know you're still alive?
translation.de: Weiß Mom, dass du noch lebst?

translation.en: Are you still mad at me?
No. It's Tommy, Violet Valentine's son.
translation.de: Nein, hier ist Tommy, Violet Valentines Sohn.

translation.en: Yeah, and Megan. I work down at the coffee shop.
translation.de: Ja, und Megan aus dem Café.

translation.en: I give you free hot water for your dehydrated soup sometimes.
translation.de: Ich gebe Ihnen manchmal Wasser für die Suppe.

translation.en: Yes. Much appreciated.
The reason I take it for free is 'cause I don't have money.
translation.de: Ich nehme es nur deshalb gratis, weil ich kein Geld habe.

translation.en: Anyway, we came over here to tell you that there's no lost kid.
translation.de: Wir wollten Ihnen nur sagen, dass es hier kein Kind gibt.

translation.en: No one's lost?
Yeah, it's just Mike Mundi trying to pull a prank on you.
translation.de: Ja, Mike Mundi hat Sie verarscht.

translation.en: Prank? No, I knew that.
So, I like the costumes.
-Garbage can? -Yeah. Tin Man.
And Red Riding Hood.
I want to be honest with you. Might not be a good year for it.
translation.de: Ganz ehrlich, es könnte für dich böse enden.

translation.en: Um, between us, there is a man-wolf on the loose.
translation.de: Unter uns, da läuft ein Wolfsmensch frei herum.

translation.en: Then maybe should I head inside?
A wise decision.
By the way, my mom was talking about you tonight.
translation.de: Meine Mom hat heute von Ihnen gesprochen.

translation.en: Your mom was talking about me? What'd she say?
translation.de: Hat sie das? Was hat sie gesagt?

translation.en: Just that you are nice.
Well, I am nice.
Because I'm not gonna tell her that you're out here playing Romeo
translation.de: Darum sage ich ihr nicht, dass du hier flirtest,

translation.en: instead of watching your two little sisters.
-Well, now I feel bad. -I know you feel bad.
-'Cause you got a big heart. -Thanks.
So, I'm gonna let you two guys take off without me. I'll give you a head start in the name of romance.
translation.de: Ich lasse euch also abziehen, im Namen der Romantik.

translation.en: -Okay. Go ahead, guys. Take care, now. -[Tommy] Thanks, Mr. Dubois.
-[Megan] Happy Halloween. -Not looking, guys!
Same corn over and over.
I should've left with the others, 'cause I have no idea where I am.
translation.de: Ich hätte mitgehen sollen, denn ich weiß nicht, wo ich bin.

translation.en: So, I came from there. I already was there.
translation.de: Von dort bin ich gekommen. Dort war ich schon.

translation.en: Can't believe I don't have a compass on my thermos.
translation.de: Dass meine Thermoskanne keinen Kompass hat…

translation.en: [muffled screaming] Help me!
[muffled screaming] Help me!
Listen, I am a fan of a Halloween zinger as much as the next guy, but…
translation.de: Hör mal, ich bin wie jeder andere ein Fan von Halloween-Späßen, aber…

translation.en: What the--
[screaming] What?
[Aurora] It's nine o'clock in Salem, which means all you trick-or-treaters
translation.de: Es ist neun Uhr in Salem, was bedeutet, dass ihr alle

translation.en: have counted up your candy corns and are gettin' ready for bed.
translation.de: eure Bonbons gezählt habt und bald schlafen geht.

translation.en: What the heck?
[Aurora] But that don't mean the fun stops for all of us.
translation.de: Aber der Spaß ist nicht für alle vorbei.

translation.en: -Hubie, I can't do this. -Michael Mundi was abducted.
translation.de: -Hubie, das geht nicht. -Michael Mundi wurde entführt.

translation.en: I found a ticket to the drive-in at the scene.
Great. Start there.
[Aurora] So, now's the time for us big boys and girls to get up to some real mischief.
translation.de: Jetzt geben wir großen Jungs und Mädchen uns echten Missetaten hin.

translation.en: [Aurora] And watch out. It's always the quiet ones who get the most naughty.
translation.de: Und passt auf, die Ruhigen sind am Ende immer die Ungezogensten.

translation.en: Violet, where the hell were you? We're falling behind out there.
translation.de: Violet, wo warst du? Wir kommen hier nicht nach.

translation.en: Well, I was on the phone with the credit card company.
translation.de: Ich habe mit der Kreditkartenfirma telefoniert.

translation.en: They didn't know I had an extension. I'm so sorry, Mr. Tayback.
translation.de: Die wussten nichts vom Zahlungsaufschub. Tut mir leid.

translation.en: You know how much credit card debt I'm in right now? Nobody gives a crap!
translation.de: Ich habe meinen Kredit auch überzogen. Das interessiert kein Schwein!

translation.en: Just do your job. No breaks on Halloween.
translation.de: Mach deinen Job. Keine Pausen an Halloween.

translation.en: [female voice] Your call has been forwarded to an automated--
She's not answering.
Don't worry, we'll find Tommy.
I am your father, and I demand some respect.
translation.de: Ich bin dein Vater und verlange Respekt.

translation.en: You are grounded for the next six months.
You son of a--
-Mmm. Hey! -Hey.
So, did I miss anything?
Yeah, you just missed the best part!
The best part is spending time alone with you.
translation.de: Die beste Stelle ist die Zeit mit dir allein.

translation.en: Did that turn you on? How is sucking on fake fingers supposed to turn me on?
translation.de: -Hat dich das angemacht? -Das Saugen an falschen Fingern?

translation.en: Well, imagine that they're your fingers.
translation.de: Stell dir vor, es wären deine.

translation.en: They're men's fingers. Are you saying I have men's fingers?
translation.de: Das sind Männerfinger. Habe ich etwa Männerfinger?

translation.en: Okay, look, I was just trying something, okay?
translation.de: Ich habe da halt was versucht, ok?

translation.en: -Something different. -Jeez, man.
[sighs] Remember we used to come here in high school?
Mm-hmm. Feels exactly the same, too. We got Hubie Dubois spying on everybody.
translation.de: Und es ist noch genauso: Hubie Dubois spioniert allen nach.

translation.en: I gotta say, it's pretty impressive how long he's been a loser.
translation.de: Es ist beeindruckend, wie lange er ein Loser ist.

translation.en: -I got a great idea. -[woman on-screen screaming]
It's kinda evil, but stick with me.
translation.de: Die ist irgendwie böse, aber mach einfach mit.

translation.en: Now, that turns me on.
Scheduled to come to the Creature Double Feature.
translation.de: Er wollte zum Creature Double Feature kommen.

translation.en: To meet who?
To kill his next victim?
translation.de: Um sein nächstes Opfer zu töten?

translation.en: -[woman] Hubie. -[screaming] Murder!
You okay, big man?
I am actually doing a follow-up on a classified situation.
translation.de: Ich untersuche hier einen streng geheimen Vorfall.

translation.en: Did you lose your thermos or some shit?
Oh, that'll never happen.
Anyway, I saw something earlier.
translation.de: Jedenfalls habe ich vorhin etwas gesehen.

translation.en: Something suspicious.
Ears are in open position.
This is gonna sound nuts.
But I was going to get popcorn earlier,
translation.de: Als ich vorhin Popcorn holen wollte,

translation.en: when this freaky old-timey car pulled into the lot.
translation.de: kam ein seltsamer Oldtimer auf das Gelände gefahren.

translation.en: And the driver was--
You just gotta see it to believe it.
Could you possibly point me in the direction of this strange vehicle?
translation.de: Könnten Sie mich wohl zu diesem seltsamen Wagen lotsen?

translation.en: It's that one.
Right there.
Okay.
Let's take a look.
-Oh, and, uh… -Yes?
Hubie, do be… careful.
What the what?
Okay, whoa, there.
Step out of the vehicle!
We can do this the easy way or the paddle way. It's up to you.
translation.de: Sonst machen wir es auf die Schläger-Tour. Sie entscheiden.

translation.en: Ghost!
Help me!
What are you?
Help me!
No! Oh, God!
Why?
[kids shouting, clamoring] Get him!
What the heck?
[grunts] Help me!
-Now do you want me? -[Mrs. Hennessy] No!
[Hubie] There's a time and a place for hijinks!
translation.de: Es gibt eine Zeit und einen Ort für Späße.

translation.en: But there's a situation going on here!
translation.de: Aber hier ist die Lage ernst!

translation.en: Hubie. It's funny seeing you here.
translation.de: Hubie. Es ist witzig, dich hier zu sehen.

translation.en: I'm sorry about before. In the basement.
translation.de: Das vorhin im Keller tut mir leid.

translation.en: I really wasn't feeling myself.
I don't know if I like you much better now.
translation.de: Jetzt finde ich Sie nicht besser.

translation.en: You didn't tell anybody about that, did you, Hubie?
translation.de: Du hast niemandem davon erzählt, oder?

translation.en: Why? You have secrets, Mr. Lambert?
As in, secretly dropping by the corn maze earlier tonight?
translation.de: Etwa ein geheimnisvoller Ausflug ins Mais-Labyrinth vorhin?

translation.en: Did anybody get--
Your tombstone says that you have yet to die.
translation.de: Auf Ihrem Grabstein steht, dass Sie noch sterben müssen.

translation.en: Are you a human being, or are you a moon-crazed beast
translation.de: Sind Sie ein Mensch oder eine Vollmond-Kreatur

translation.en: from beyond the grave, grave, grave?
Hold that thought! I gotta split!
translation.de: Das vertagen wir. Ich muss weg!

translation.en: That just answered my question.
[male announcer] Oh, man. That's another one.
What a man! What a mouth! And on his first try.
translation.de: Was für ein Mann! Was für ein Mund! Und beim ersten Versuch.

translation.en: Have a round of applause, everyone.
Who's next? If the mayor can do it, so can you.
translation.de: -Wer will jetzt? -Der Bürgermeister hat es vorgemacht.

translation.en: You, sir! Step on up.
Sorry to bother you, mayor, but it's important.
What is it, Sergeant?
About an hour ago, I got a strange report of a missing high school kid from Hubie Dubois.
translation.de: Hubie Dubois hat mir von einem vermissten Schüler berichtet.

translation.en: After I laughed it off as usual, I got a call from the kid's mother.
translation.de: Erst hab ich natürlich gelacht, dann rief die Mutter an.

translation.en: He actually never made it home.
This Richard Hartman thing has got you jumpy as hell.
translation.de: Sie sind nervös wegen Richard Hartman.

translation.en: I suggest we cancel the fireworks show immediately.
translation.de: Wir sollten das Feuerwerk sofort absagen.

translation.en: We ain't canceling a damn thing, Sergeant. We got an unsolved mystery!
translation.de: -Wir sagen gar nichts ab. -Es ist ein ungelöstes Rätsel.

translation.en: Eighty-five percent of the tourism dollars spent in this town are spent on Halloween night.
translation.de: 85 % aller Einnahmen durch Touristen kommen an Halloween rein.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna let no high school peckerhead jeopardize that.
translation.de: Und ich lasse nicht zu, dass ein Schulrüpel das gefährdet.

translation.en: -I just think that-- -Trick-or-treat, smell my feet.
translation.de: -Ich denke… -Süßes oder riechen Sie meine Füße.

translation.en: -I just think that you're not-- -Smell my feet.
-I just think that-- -Smell my feet.
You really want me to smell them?
Let's just go back, Danielle.
I don't want Mom to get home and see that Tommy left us by ourselves.
translation.de: Mom soll nicht wissen, dass Tommy uns alleingelassen hat.

translation.en: I think we'll all get in really big trouble for that.
Are we even going the right way?
Excuse me, sir?
Do you know the quickest way to Wallace Orchard?
translation.de: Wie kommt man zum Wallace Orchard?

translation.en: -♪ It was Halloween night at the castle… ♪ -Hey, handsome. Soup's ready.
translation.de: -Es war Halloween… -Hübscher, die Suppe ist fertig.

translation.en: One clam, one chicken noodle, and one split pea.
translation.de: Eine Muschelsuppe, eine Hühnerbrühe und eine Erbsensuppe.

translation.en: So, you seem a little stressed. I mean, what can I do to help ya out?
translation.de: Du wirkst gestresst. Wie kann ich dir helfen?

translation.en: Maybe a glass of Chardonnay?
Well, to be honest with ya, I don't drink beer.
translation.de: Um ehrlich zu sein, trinke ich kein Bier.

translation.en: But do you have any silver bullets?
That is not on the menu tonight.
translation.de: Die stehen heute nicht auf der Karte.

translation.en: But I happen to be an excellent listener if you want to, you know,
translation.de: Aber ich kann hervorragend zuhören, falls du etwas, na ja…

translation.en: share anything with me.
Okay.
We all have a purpose.
Some people's purpose is to make sure all the streets are clean.
Some people's purpose, like Kenny Rogers', is to make sure there's great tunes on the radio
translation.de: Andere wiederum, wie Kenny Rogers, sorgen für tolle Musik im Radio,

translation.en: that we can all sing along with on road trips.
translation.de: damit wir im Auto mitsingen können.

translation.en: Some people's purpose, like you,
are here to make sure that kids without parents end up with a mom anyways.
translation.de: sorgen dafür, dass Kinder ohne Eltern eine Mutter bekommen.

translation.en: Who is nice and kind to 'em and makes them feel loved.
translation.de: Die gut ist und ihnen das Gefühl von Liebe gibt.

translation.en: -You happen to have any A1 Sauce? -Yeah.
My whole life, I felt my purpose was to make sure everybody
translation.de: Mein Leben lang dachte ich, ich müsste dafür sorgen,

translation.en: was safe and sound on Halloween.
translation.de: dass an Halloween alle sicher sind.

translation.en: But tonight, I have failed massively.
translation.de: Aber heute habe ich massiv versagt.

translation.en: Because a fine young man was abducted under my watch.
translation.de: Ein guter Junge wurde nämlich während meiner Schicht entführt.

translation.en: -That's on me. -No.
How can I help you?
You just did help me by listening to my story.
translation.de: Das hast du bereits, indem du mir zugehört hast.

translation.en: Be careful today. Danger is afoot.
translation.de: Sei heute vorsichtig. Es lauern Gefahren.

translation.en: Oh, well, I don't worry about me. I worry about my kids.
translation.de: Ich mache mir keine Sorgen um mich, nur um meine Kinder.

translation.en: Called home. None of 'em picked up.
translation.de: Zu Hause geht niemand ans Telefon.

translation.en: They're probably just watching a movie, though, and…
translation.de: Sie schauen wahrscheinlich nur einen Film und…

translation.en: -Tommy's keeping an eye on them. -Tommy?
I'm sure he's been there the whole time. Without a doubt.
translation.de: Er ist bestimmt die ganze Zeit da.

translation.en: The night is young. Appreciate you being nice to me.
translation.de: Die Nacht ist jung. Danke, dass du so nett warst.

translation.en: Of course, Hubie. You're the best person I know.
translation.de: Natürlich, Hubie. Du bist der beste Mensch, den ich kenne.

translation.en: You're always thinking of everyone else and never of yourself.
translation.de: Du denkst immer an alle anderen und nie an dich.

translation.en: But I guess that's why you're a hero.
translation.de: Das macht dich wohl zum Helden.

translation.en: Did you see how scared Scooby was when that car started moving? [laughing]
translation.de: Hast du gesehen, wie Scooby Angst hatte, als das Auto losfuhr?

translation.en: -With his ping-pong paddle at the ready! -Oh, my God!
What a buffoon!
[mocking Hubie's voice] Mr. Hennessy! Mr. Hennessy!
There's somebody in the road.
-Who the hell is that? -It's not moving.
translation.de: Wer zur Hölle ist das? Es bewegt sich gar nicht. Sieht aus wie eine Puppe.

translation.en: Looks like a dummy.
translation.de: Es bewegt sich gar nicht. Sieht aus wie eine Puppe.

translation.en: You look like a dummy. Go out and get it out of the way.
translation.de: Geh raus und schaff es aus dem Weg.

translation.en: Okay.
Now, see, that does it for me.
You like that?
No.
Scarecrow?
I'm gonna kick your ass for this, Lester.
translation.de: Dafür knall ich dir eine, Lester.

translation.en: I swear to God, if you jump out of one of these bushes,
translation.de: Wenn du aus den Büschen springst,

translation.en: I'm gonna punch you in the face!
What the--
Where are you?
[Hubie] Valentine family, where are you?
I'm coming!
I say, "Marco." You say, "Polo." Marco!
[man 1] Weirdo!
[man 2] Asshole!
Hubie Dubois! Is that you?
[Walter] Oh! You must be Mrs. Dubois!
I'm Walter!
Nice to meet you, Walter.
It's a shame what they've done to your lawn!
translation.de: Eine Schande, das mit Ihrem Rasen!

translation.en: Happens every year!
Not tonight!
We need to talk.
[Tommy] They're not up here.
[Megan] They're not down here, either.
-We didn't find them. -Hey! It's okay. We'll figure it out.
translation.de: -Sie sind weg. -Ruhig, uns fällt was ein.

translation.en: -We'll find them. -[pounding at door]
What are we screaming at?
-Bam. -Mr. Dubois, I screwed up.
-I can't find my sisters. -You don't know where the kids are? Huh.
translation.de: -Meine Schwestern sind weg. -Du weißt nicht, wo sie sind?

translation.en: 'Cause I do. They're right here.
-[girls] Tommy! Tommy! -Oh, my God!
I'm so sorry I left guys. I'm so glad you're okay.
translation.de: Es tut mir leid. Zum Glück seid ihr ok.

translation.en: You are so cute with them.
translation.de: Du bist so süß mit ihnen.

translation.en: You have a girlfriend?
I saw 'em coming through the Old McMillan shortcut.
translation.de: Ich sah sie an der Old-McMillan-Abkürzung.

translation.en: It was funny, 'cause not many people know where that shortcut is.
Just me and a friend of mine, Richie Hartman. When I was a kid,
translation.de: Nur ich und ein Freund, Richie Hartman.

translation.en: we used to finish our band practice and shoot right through there.
translation.de: Früher liefen wir nach der Bandprobe immer dort entlang.

translation.en: -Well, at least everybody's safe. -No one in Salem is safe tonight.
Do you understand me, Tommy? That's why I'm putting this family on lockdown.
translation.de: Verstehst du? Darum sperre ich diese Familie ein.

translation.en: Now, Tommy, you call your mother. Let her know you're home.
translation.de: Tommy, ruf deine Mom an. Sag, du bist zu Hause.

translation.en: Megan, you call your parents. Let them know you're staying at a friend's. That's for you.
translation.de: Megan, sag deinen Eltern, du bist bei einem Freund. Für dich.

translation.en: You two, do me a favor. Eat all the candy you want, and then go straight to sleep.
translation.de: Ihr beide esst so viel Süßes, wie ihr wollt, und geht schlafen.

translation.en: And lock this door! No matter what, don't answer it!
translation.de: Schließt die Tür ab! Was auch passiert, macht nicht auf!

translation.en: What're you gonna do, Mr. Dubois?
I'm gonna do what I do every October 31st.
translation.de: Was ich immer am 31. Oktober mache.

translation.en: Make sure every citizen in this town is safe and protected.
translation.de: Ich sorge dafür, dass jeder in dieser Stadt sicher ist.

translation.en: Um, but do you have a bathroom I could use? 'Cause I, uh…
translation.de: Aber könnte ich die Toilette benutzen? Weil ich…

translation.en: The soup kinda went right through me.
Upstairs.
Toilet? Is it a big toilet?
'Cause I got a lot to do.
I know that howl.
The transformation is complete.
While I understand that you are now a mindless killing machine,
translation.de: Ich verstehe, dass du jetzt eine hirnlose Tötungsmaschine bist,

translation.en: I would like to speak with the human being that is deep down below your fur.
translation.de: aber ich möchte mit dem Menschen sprechen, der tief unter deinem Fell steckt.
